Name: Deploy SSRS Reports from a package
Description: Uploads SSRS reports to an SSRS server from a NuGet package.

Parameters.Name: NugetPackageStepName
Parameters.Label: SSRS package step
Parameters.HelpText: Select the step in this project which downloads the SSRS package.

Parameters.Name: ReportServerUrl
Parameters.Label: Url of SSRS Server service
Parameters.HelpText:
The complete Url to the SSRS server.
Example: http://198.239.216.46/ReportServer_LOCALDEV/reportservice2010.asmx?wsdl

Parameters.Name: ReportExecutionUrl
Parameters.Label: Report Execution Url
Parameters.HelpText:
The complete Url to the Report Execution service.
Example: http://198.239.216.46/ReportServer_LOCALDEV/ReportExecution2005.asmx?wsdl

Parameters.Name: ReportFolder
Parameters.Label: Report folder
Parameters.HelpText: Relative Url to the folder in which the reports will be deployed.

Parameters.Name: ReportDatasourceFolder
Parameters.Label: Report data source folder
Parameters.HelpText: Relative Url where the data sources for the reports are located.
